mapper.update: update trade set money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_date = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, money, trade_type, trade_date, create_date, update_date, user_id, account_id, item_id from trade where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, money, trade_type, trade_date, create_date, update_date, user_id, account_id, item_id from trade
